title: Conveniencia Marcussi
text: This site is a onepage, based on the Marcussi coffee shop. Using the following tools: Wordpress - Elementor - Figma

title: Campezzi Cortinas
text: This website was designed and structured to elevate the credibility of the curtains and blinds company. Featuring a minimalist and fully responsive design. Tools used: WordPress, Elementor Pro, and Figma.

title: GCR Digital
text: This project is a landing page whose objective is to emphasize your digital exhibition proposal, as it is a Marketing agency that works well on Call to action, Responsive Design, calibrated SEO and Performance at the highest level.

title: Fernanda Feijoeiro
text: This project is a Landing Page whose objective is to publicize the Leduc International Method course, a method renowned throughout the world. This project includes techniques currently used by professionals in the web design area, such as responsiveness, SEO and performance optimization techniques.
